column6: are in  Group C of the 2022 FIFA World Cup and 2023 AFC Asian Cup Joint-Qualifiers.------The Angkor Warriors (ranked 170) will face Dilmun’s Warriors (ranked 109) under Portuguese manager ------Hélio Filipe Dias de Sousa.------Bahrain were also held to a 1-1 draw by Iraq in their opening match at the Bahrain National Stadium last week.------W------Kick-off is at 6.30 pm local time at the Phnom Penh Olympic Stadium.------W------Viewers in Cambodia watch the match on------ ------BTV------ ------.
